oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oxidative Dearomatization: Synthesis of Functionalized Bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones, Sigmatropic Shift in Excited State, and Radical-Induced Cleavage of Cyclopropane Ring
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ARORA, K
SINGH, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: oxa-di-pi-methane rearrangement
Diels-Alder reaction
pericyclic reaction
photochemistry
STEREOSELECTIVE ROUTE
NATURAL-PRODUCTS
ENANTIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
MOLECULAR COMPLEXITY
CYCLOADDITION
CONSTRUCTION

VINIGROL
SYSTEMS
CORE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Synthesis of novel bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones endowed with a beta,gamma-enone system in which gamma-carbon is substituted with an electron-withdrawing group from simple aromatics is described. Oxa-di-pi-methane reaction of bicyclo[2.2.2]octenones to functionalized bicyclo[3.3.0]octanes and their transformation to bicyclo[3.2.1]octane framework are also presented.
